mxCell.value:
Requirements

System
  • Keep track of groceries at home
  • Add, modify, and delete recipes
    • Recipes have:
      • ingredients ("groceries") and amounts ("units"?)
      • instructions
      • comments (心得)
  • Look up what recipes can be made using the groceries at home
  • Generate a shopping list based on a set of recipes (which groceries need to be purchased if we want to complete a given set of recipes)
  • Support multiple users (multiple people can log into the same server)
  • Support multiple kitchens (multiple users can share a kitchen)
    • Kitchens have:
      • groceries
      • recipes
      • one head chef (主廚)
      • many sous chefs (副主廚)
  • Simple kitchen-based permission scheme (everyone belonging to a kitchen can do anything in that kitchen)
    • head chef can add or remove sous chefs to a kitchen
    • sous chefs can do everything head chefs can do, except add or remove other chefs
Interface
  • Desktop browser support
  • Mobile browser support
  • Advanced features:
    1. support simultaneous editing + autosave
    2. push notifications
  • UI
    • tabbed approach?
    • react (for v1?)
    • typescript?

Kitchen

+ Recipes: []Recipe

+ HeadChefs: []User

+ SousChefs: []User

+ Public: bool


+ Name: string

+ Uuid: string

+ CreatedAt: date

ShoppingList

Role (RBAC)

Roles: HeadChef, SousChef

Objects: Kitchen

Abilties:

- Everything

- Everything but adding roles
Grocery Definitions Visible to Members of Yurii's Kitchen
Grocery Definitions Visible to Members of Felix's Kitchen
Grocery Definitions Visible to Members of Yurii's Kitchen
Grocery Definitions Visible to Members of Felix's Kitchen
Downside: cannot share grocery definitions between kitchens. Possible alternative would be to use group/role-based approach?

Login
  1. Receive either email, username with password or oauth
  2. Return "JWT" to the client [Sign in]

Create Kitchen
  1. Provide name, public status and at least one head chef (defaults to current user?)

Join Kitchen
  1. Make a request to join kitchens from a list of public kitchens
  2. Have this request be granted or denied

Delete Kitchen
  1. Delete kitchen and all constituent recipes

Add Grocery Definition
  1. Add name, description, unit and assign grocery definition to a kitchen [Create Grocery]

Modify Grocery Definition
  1. Change name, or description
  2. Change unit and reassign grocery definition (user warning or restricted in some cases?)

Add ingredients to Kitchen 
  1. Choose Grocery Definition
  2. Define amount of ingredient

Modify ingredients within Kitchen 
  1. Redefine amount of ingredient

Add Recipe to Kitchen 
  1. Provide name, description, ingredients, and instructions
  2. Optionally provide comment for recipe

Cook Recipe
  1. Choose Recipe
  2. Cook Recipe (Subtract ingredients and create shopping list if needed)

Modify Recipe 
  1. Change name, description, ingredients, and instructions
  2. Optionally add, delete, or change comment in recipe
